sys_ui_macro.description: Open a new window with the update set loaded.
sys_ui_macro.name: go_to_update_set
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" />
<j:set var="jvar_n" value="go_to_update_set_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/>
<g:reference_decoration id="${jvar_n}" field="${ref}"
  onclick="goToUpdateSet('${ref}'); "
  title="${gs.getMessage('Open the update set in a new tab/window')}" image="images/icons/tasks.gifx" icon="icon-pop-out"/>

<script>
function goToUpdateSet(reference) {
	try {
	var baseUri = g_scratchpad.curr_env_url;
	var usSysId = g_scratchpad.curr_us_sys_id;
	var url = baseUri + '/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fsys_update_set.do%3Fsys_id%3D' + usSysId;
	window.open(url);
	} catch (e) {
		jslog('error showing updateSet decoration');
		jslog(e);
	}
}

</script>
</j:jelly>
